articles.author: Kevin Draper
articles.title: Olympics 2022 Live: Medal Count, Results and News - The New York Times
articles.description: A top Russian official calls Thomas Bach’s comments “inappropriate and wrong.” Eileen Gu wins her second gold, but the U.S. men’s curling team falls in a battle for bronze. Two American sleds could contend in two-woman bobsled.
articles.content:
Eileen Gu after winning the gold medal in freestyle skiing halfpipe.Credit...Doug Mills/The New York Times
Eileen Gu did what she set out to do.

articles.title: San Francisco Recall Vote Fueled by Asian Voters’ Ire - The New York Times
articles.description: The landslide vote to remove three school board members cut across ethnicities and income levels. But Chinese American voters and volunteers were crucial to victory, organizers say.
